attributes.action: Scrap legal aid on divorce and create 50/50 access to children following divorce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to propose that legal aid is abolished for divorce. Paying for the divorce would focus the minds of divorcing couples to be more civil with each other and put their children if they have any first. 

Doing this would encourage both parties to the mediation table. The parents would be more child centered and society would have less damaged children.

The government should also look at 50/50 automatic custody unless proved that either party is unsuitable to care for them
